PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-08392014-06-20,  ,  ,  ,  CIC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that employers continue to bear the full cost of assessing Labour Market Impact Assessments (LMIA); and (2) ensure that LMIA applications for positions in feed lot services are treated the same as other positions in the primary agriculture sector.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0169 Publication Date: 2014-07-02
AttachmentsAttachment
